website_summaries.verdict: An educational word-based game that also requires plenty of creativity.
pros: Can be played just two players or in a larger group and rules don't take long to learn
A little creativity is all you need to be a pro at this game
It's an excellent game to encourage kids to expand their vocabularies
cons: Timer doesn't beep or buzz when time is up
Not suitable for young children who cannot yet read or write

customer_reviews.title: Missing it's Classic Timer--but Still Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We've had an older copy of Scattergories in my family for years. When I moved out, I bought myself a copy to keep it handy when I had the family over. I was sad to see that the old wind up timer has been replaced with a standard plastic hourglass timer! Not only does someone have to be watching it to know when time's up, but I miss the "POP!" of the old, windup timer (it always made everyone jump--and that was part of the fun!) But the lists are still solid--we'll probably just end up using our iPhones for an audible, more interesting timer.
customer_reviews.author: VGSB

customer_reviews.title: If you like Scattergories save your time and get an older verison
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from the new version if you are a longtime fan of the game. The rules changed and they've gone really cheap on the pieces. The new boards for writing on are really cheap cardboard and don't have space to hold the cards alongside. There's only enough boards for 4 players. If you like Scattergories save your time and get an older verison.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Fun for teens through adults - easy to start and appropriately challenging.
customer_reviews.text: pretty fun game, but you definitely need teams and a group to make it interesting. the concept and gameplay is easy so easy to get started. You role the dice to pick a letter and then have to pick 12 words from different categories that start with that letter in a reasonably small amount of time. Fun competition for the family if you have teens or young adult kids. All of our kids enjoyed this one with us. Definitely more challenging then we thought it would be after reading the very simple rules.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Not enough in the box!
customer_reviews.text: I love Scattergories, but I had lost some of the cards to my old version. I bought this thinking it would just have more and probably new cards. The format is fine, I like that they give you a folder to put your card in and I don't even mind that the cards are small. What disappointed me is that there are only 4 folders and only 4 people (or 4 "teams") can play at a time. Teams are okay, but then, the small size of the cards is a little bit of a problem and it would really be better if there were at least 6 folders. You should get more for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mentz

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but REALLY cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game as a kid and it still holds up now as a fun game to play with a group. But sadly, they have changed the configuration of the boards and no longer have clips to hold the card, pens, paper. It feels cheap and flimsy and makes the game a little more difficult when papers and cards are falling out constantly. I find we don't play as often as I thought we would because it's just annoying how it is set up now. Don't know why Hasbro changed it but it was NOT for the better. If you want this game, I might try looking elsewhere (Target perhaps?) for the original version.
customer_reviews.author: jessicab

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra few dollars for the original version
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this game and it has been a staple at our family cabin. I will say that I wish I would have splurged the extra money to get the original version. This is not as durable as the original and also doesn't come with a buzzer. Mo buzzer is hard because someone has to then take their concentration off completing their list, to check the hourglass timer. Still love the game, but not worth saving a few bucks for this version. Classic case of: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Our family's favorite game--old and young adults alike
customer_reviews.text: We have a collection of probably 40 games that we play, and are always looking for those that promote group play at the holidays that are not overly specific to any particular person's tastes or skills. This game is one that we all enjoy, is easiest to learn, everybody seems to have a turn to win, and we all laugh a lot. Isn't that the point?
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Fun during quarantine
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is such an underrated game! We first played this on our vacation to Lake Tahoe where we found it in our hotel room. Once quarantine hit I knew we had to get it, how else are you going to keep busy?! My fiancé and I have been playing just the two of us on our at home date nights and we always have a blast. But when my family comes over the game can easily be played with more players. Super fun, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Woods

customer_reviews.title: The same game we all know and love!
customer_reviews.text: I have such good memories of playing this with my fam when I was little. This is the same great game, with a few category changes (I think). Since we've been quarantined, we have been playing A LOT of Scattergories. We even play with my family over Skype! So easy to learn, family friendly, but still a challenge no matter what age you are.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Larson

customer_reviews.title: hilarious game
customer_reviews.text: a real review that's less complainey: agreed its not as great as the original like 40 years ago with a loud timer and clips for the cards and your page, but this game is still hilarious and you can learn it immediately. Great for any age. It's challenging and can provide lots of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Tabat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GAME
customer_reviews.text: love this game sooo much!!! it brings so many of my friends and family together. we learn, grow, and laugh together. we used up all the papers and basically used the game til we burned it to the ground lmao. just bought a fresh new one and excited to continue the fun! thanks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good Quality as the Original
customer_reviews.text: This 3 star rating has nothing to do with the supplier and everything to do with companies getting cheap. The original Scattergories back in the day was a much better set, with heavy duty answer books, decent cards, better paper, a better board. When we opened this one, it almost felt like a knockoff. Oh well. Still plays the same, so if you misplaced your original or want to play a fun word game, you'll still have fun.
customer_reviews.author: WebErika

customer_reviews.title: MISSING CARDS! (1-4)
customer_reviews.text: While my husband and I were playing we noticed that the game was missing card! It didn't bring cards 1-2, and 3-4. I'm going to contact the company to see what can be done because we did not get the full game!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lamarre

customer_reviews.title: Great game cheap version
customer_reviews.text: Love the game but this version is a bit cheap and does not have clips for the cards like previous version I have played. I love the game but wish this version were sturdier. Good second set for anyone that already has this game but I would spend more money for a better version.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Family Time - gets the kids off devices!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo much fun and helped us have family time again! Board games have so much competition with electronics and this one won out. My 14-year-old daughter absolutely loved it and has asked mom and dad to play again. Now THAT is something!
customer_reviews.author: W. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Super fun group game!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this game! I bought it for a wedding gift. It arrived nicely packaged. No dings or look of distress. It’s a great price too! I love this because it’s a fun, family game for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Chari Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for a smaller group
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game we just wish it came with more boards so more of us could play at the same time. I think the new boards are a little less durable than the old design and I wish I would've kept my old game instead of tossing it! It's a lot if fun it easily makes you use your brain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game - my family and friends Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm from the Caribbean and this game reminds us of our local "Boy, Girls, Animal, Place, Thing". This game just has more categorizes which makes it more fun. Love the dice as well. Look forward to having fun filled family events with Scattergories. Would have preferred the 6 player game rather than the 4 player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but the game box was bent and torn. The shipping box was intact, so the game was damaged before it was packaged to go in the mail. I don't have the time to return it for a new one and the game parts work fine as they are. The only internal game damage is that the holders for the papers are all bent.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Fun for most ages
customer_reviews.text: We love this game even though it is a tad pricy. The rules are a little tougher for a child since there are some subtle descriptions that they might not understand. but no big deal, just choose another description for them to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made now. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cheaply made version of the older ones. The cardboard pieces don’t have a pencil holder anymore and just fold in half. I was very disappointed. The game is just the same though. So some may not know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: JClendenin

customer_reviews.title: Gets my kids off their electronics!
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun for the whole family- my kids play it with me and my parents! Gets them off their electronics- id say it’s a WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Really good game!
customer_reviews.text: Really good game!!!! Its fun to play with family or friends, for the price you get what you pay for in terms of the quality of the cardboard and the egg timer.... when games used to cost more money you would get high quality electronic timers and nice cardboard holders etc... but whatever it costs $13 so I'm not going to complain, it does the trick :D
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good classic game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our family as I use to really enjoy it was I was a kid. I was disappointed the boards are not very sturdy. Much preferred the old boards that had the cards that would slide in. But we have been enjoying the game and having fun. It's a good classic!
customer_reviews.author: JudiLynne

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting nice boards that held card and lists and a battery ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected. I play this with friends and wanted to order my own. It came with cheap boards that ripped apart and a cheap plastic sand time. I thought I was getting nice boards that held card and lists and a battery operated timer. Really disappointed. It is a throw away game.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Howell

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for all ages. I just wish they had expansion packs. This is a great family game that you can play many times. In my family, it always leads to a bu ch of laughs over silly answers.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Vowell

customer_reviews.title: Classic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a "fun day" activity for my students. They loved it, and so did I.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, just like we remembered
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game & excellent value! I saw some other reviewers complain that the timer was an hour glass and that the game boards (that hold the papers) were cheaply made. We have zero problems with this. For the timer we used our cell phones (set for 3 mins) and the only way the boards and papers don't work out well is if you're a crazy maniac or in a windstorm. I would certainly buy this again, esp for the price!
customer_reviews.author: sollunaestelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: I played this game often as a kid and purchased it for us to play as a family. Ironically, the cardboard folders seem to be a lower quality than they used to be. Still had fun playing.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is my family's favorite indoor game. We're all adults so I can't comment on whether kids would like it. But it's really fun for us. I think that you need at least 4 players to make it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, but I was let down on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with the this version compared to the older release I was replacing. There are more scategory cards for more possible unique rounds, so plus one. However, there was no way to fix the sheet to the board (annoying!) and the sand timer is a joke. You need a timer that ticks so everyone can hear it while they're busy writing. We had to use our phone timer. Fun game, but I was let down on the execution.
customer_reviews.author: K-man

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for friends!
customer_reviews.text: What I love: It's fast paced, makes you think, and is fun even when you are done writing things down and gasp and crack up at what your friends wrote. What could be different: I wish there was a little more time. There are so many categories and most of the times everyone has a big chunk of spaces just empty. Maybe 30 more seconds in the next version :D Conclusion: Buy it! It's inexpensive and a great addition to your party game arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: shezzy153

customer_reviews.title: Great Game/Horrible Edition
customer_reviews.text: Scattergories is a game almost everyone loves. Simple and fun. This edition is embarrassingly bad, however. Everything is as cheap as possible. No audible timer, fewer boards, cheaper boards, not even a piece of cardboard upon which to roll the die. Hasbro must have figured they could save $.12 per game in manufacturing costs and happily released a garbage edition. You should still buy the game because it's still playable and it's the only edition available. Just know it's junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Game night hit!.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. She is happy with it so it gets five stars all around. Now she is ready for game night with something new.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Vidal

customer_reviews.title: always a classic
customer_reviews.text: I've been a scattergories fan since it came out. Still love it and they've added list and questions. I have young children who don't know what leisure activities are...so I change up some questions for them and we don't play with a timer...they love trying to come up with the beginning letter...now when I play with other adults it's all our war...every round someone is getting an answer challenged.
customer_reviews.author: musicorcomedylove

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the family! Doesn’t seem like they give you enough time though. Also you can play this game for free with some pencils and paper \(. .)/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite family game
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our family's favorite games to play and we needed to replace our old one. Got a great deal on black Friday and even better deal after!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great game for 2 people or a big group!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this game! It's fun with just 2 people but is also a great game for a group of people as well. Creative and gets people laughing at other peoples answers! + it's SUPER easy to explain (not complicated!)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany - Zaley Designs

customer_reviews.title: Great game for families or groups
customer_reviews.text: Scattergories is probably the only game we go back to again and again. Our kids are teens and we play this on vacation or on Christmas when everyone is together. Always good for a laugh. I bought the "refill" cards too.
customer_reviews.author: WendellBee

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My family plays lots and lots of games. Scattergories is one of our favorites. We give my younger grandson, 9 years old, a little leeway on his responses, lol. A great family game for young and old.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Clean Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: My extended family of teenagers LOVED this COVID family night activity at the beach, in the park, and playing over ZOOM.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: My favorite board game !!
customer_reviews.text: Scattergories is really fun, I have always loved this game and finally bought it. It's incredibly easy to play and perfect for family night.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Everyone had such fun and came up with some pretty creative answers
customer_reviews.text: I was planning a game night with some friends and wanted to try something new. I played this as a kid and remember really liking it. It was a blast. Everyone had such fun and came up with some pretty creative answers. I played it with some family and my sister in law got online as soon as we finished and ordered it for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Freeman

customer_reviews.title: So
customer_reviews.text: Great family and extended family. Get together regularly with 14 family members playing in teams, and we have a ball!!
customer_reviews.author: Churchlady85

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, crappy timer
customer_reviews.text: Just had family game night last night and we all loved it! Only drawback, the timer. This one doesn't have a winding one that beeps at you, which is necessary for this game, it has an hourglass. Players are distracted because we all keeps looking up to see if the sand is gone yet. However, it is an easy fix to use your phone timer instead. Timer is the only reason it got dropped a star.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Neuschwander

customer_reviews.title: Versatile game, great for a game collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun game to play. It's a great game for people who don't know each other well, or for family. It is also a fun game with just a couple people, or a whole lot! The versatility makes it a must-have. Everyone seems to enjoy playing this game as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jollymama

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to pass the time with family and friends! We’ve had a lot of fun with this game and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: OMG our Family LOVES this game!!!! My 13 yr old daughter had it on her Christmas list, I really did not know what it was but purchased it for her. She asked me to play it with her Christmas night & I reluctantly said yes (I'm not a huge fan of board games)! Lol Anyway, this game was right up my alley! We could even lay on the couch & play it! I now ask her if we can play it!!! Great game!
customer_reviews.author: Jody F

customer_reviews.title: Great for game night!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite games as a kid and it didn’t disappoint now! Love playing scattergories with family and friends on game night now!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Scattagorees is a fun game
customer_reviews.text: This came as a party favor. It’s been around forever. It never gets old.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen  McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what else to say. Be prepared to think a lot.
customer_reviews.author: RhysKrispies

customer_reviews.title: My son love it
customer_reviews.text: Me and my son love this game. Took a while to receive but worth the wait. His only complain is I win this game every time.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: It won't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Fun, easy, interactive game for family, friends, church groups etc.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Still Fun but Not as Well Made As the Old One
customer_reviews.text: Family favorite! Ours was literally 20 years old, figured it was time for a new one. I don't love the new folders for your answers but they aren't that bad. I liked the old timer too, it wound up and made noise. Now you just get a sand timer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game, crappy quality edition
customer_reviews.text: They don’t make it like they used to! Cheap quality for sure. Still the same old great game
customer_reviews.author: A+J Farren

customer_reviews.title: It's a great one for the entire family that will provide countless ...
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this game! It's a great one for the entire family that will provide countless hours of laughs and creativity, Turn that tv off, put down the remote and grab a board game! You won't regret it :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! It is a family friendly game but when playing without kids your answers can make it a little more R (or X) rated! It is versatile and never gets old. For sure a crowd pleaser. Great value when purchased in bundle pack w/ Taboo.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Blackard

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game to play with friends and family! Perfect for game night!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brooks

customer_reviews.title: One of my family’s favorite games!
customer_reviews.text: We have game night at our house quite often. We love playing this game. The kids have fun with it and so do the adults. Classic favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Office Admin

customer_reviews.title: Easily the most fun and engaging board game of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most fun and engaging board game of the last 20 years. Ive had 3 versions of this game and this one is the best. It has the most options for different types of play if you want to switch it up. My 7 year old neice loves it and even tries to play with the adults. Its always a different game when you add in new players. Not a lot of moving parts, so its easy to keep control of the board and pieces. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun and can be adjusted to larger groups than stated ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun and can be adjusted to larger groups than stated if you want. Makes us laugh, and create words that have never been heard of! This is a crowd pleaser.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too small and it feels so cheaply made/put together. Not worth the $ at all
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Ahumada

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun to play as a family game. My kids ages 14, 11 and 7 like to grab a parent and divide up in teams. Fun family and kid friendly game.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Fuuun
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite games from when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: SaraCC85

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: What a great fun game for young adults and up!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kosch

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite games as a child and I’m so excited to share it with my own!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheaper version of scattergories. Perfect for adults and children who can care for the parts. I love this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mystikhrs

customer_reviews.title: Great game everyone should own it
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest this is one of the most fun party games ever there's nothing bad to say about scattegories and it arrived
customer_reviews.author: tom musselman

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: honestly you could play this game without buying anything, but it makes it a lot more fun to have the game!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Constant laughter
customer_reviews.text: Played this game at a party for the first time and immediately realized I needed to purchase it. I raced home after the party and purchased this game - I play it every chance that I get. It is hilarious
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and exactly what I wanted!! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a great party game, especially when people don’t know each other that well. It is easy to learn and requires little clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonchica

customer_reviews.title: Like the Smaller Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I remember this game from several years ago. I like this smaller packaging with simpler answer-sheet holders. Fun game for family and/friends. Kit includes everything from the original but uses less expensive/refined materials. The dice is the same, the answer sheets are similar but the sheet holder is thinner cardboard whereas the original had a thicker, almost gameboard material.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has so much fun playing this. The Youngest is 11.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My family and I love this game
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this game! Simple to play and each round only lasts a few minutes. Can be downright hilarious at times and you can fit in a bunch of games within a short time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Logic

customer_reviews.title: The only complaint I have for this game...
customer_reviews.text: Is that it only comes with four of everything. I have a large family and we have to either play in teams or ghetto separate and share all of the papers and cards because we don't like playing in teams. Super fun game. It's interesting fun to see how different or alike you are with the people you are playing against. It's a family favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cheap version of the game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game but this is a cheap version of the game. Holders and not high quality and there is only 4 copies of the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable for All
customer_reviews.text: A classic that is still as fun as always. This may forever remain my favorite game. It is one of the rare games that is enjoyable no matter the crowd.
customer_reviews.author: ChefKronk

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE GAME!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game to play with family and friends alike. Even my 6 year old has a blast playing and my 4 year old can join in with some assistance reading. I feel like this is a must have for every household. You can even twist it up a little with adults after the kids are asleep! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how cheap everything looks now a days
customer_reviews.text: Always played my parents version of this. It's amazing how cheap everything looks now a days. The timer is just a VERY cheap tube/sand timer. You get 1 writing pad, so you tear off a single sheet to put it in your cheap cardboard booklet. It's horribly cheap. Not anything like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR A FUN NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT ARRIVED QUICKLY AND IS AN ABSOLUTE A BLAST! HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR A FUN NIGHT! ALSO, THE PRICE IS CONSIDERABLY LOWER ON AMAZON THAN MY LOCAL STORE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loooove this game
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite go to game! As long as you can read and write it’s super fun!
customer_reviews.author: amanda kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: I love scattergories! This is my all time favorite game for game night. I've introduced this game to many of my family and friends of all ages and backgrounds and it is always a hit. It seems this version is a little more current with the categories which is appreciated. They replaced the buzzer with a sand timer. Not a huge fan of it, but in reality everyone has a smart phone now days so there is always a timer with a buzzer around.
customer_reviews.author: smarkpol

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cheaply produced version of the original game. I was expecting a proper ringing timer, not a sand timer. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Kids to adults love this game. Easy to play but fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Alyse Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Great product & quality. Highly recommended! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this game so much
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this game so much. We play it a lot and we still have not run out of sheets. It's pretty durable but the cardboard paper holder things are starting to come apart but it has gone through a lot. I would like to have more of them
customer_reviews.author: Brit W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multi-generational game
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous game to play with teens! Vocabulary builder as well as encouragement to emote.
customer_reviews.author: mbl

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Me and family play this game often. Fun. Good condition. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: ... the one I had as a kid but still fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy compared to the one I had as a kid but still fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Paula A Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! Be careful with the cardboard sheet holders, they can rip easily.
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We did this one this year as a family gift from Santa and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: 100% yes
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun to play! Great for kids and adults and can be a naughty or nice as the players choose to be. I 100% recommend this for anyone looking for a good time. The game itself came in excellent condition- brand new with no dented corners or missing game pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family game
customer_reviews.text: Perfect family game. Depending upon the ages of the children, pairing up with parents may be necessary, but everyone has such fun playing.
customer_reviews.author: sissie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game for brainy groups
customer_reviews.text: I love scattergories! Such a great game for families and groups of friends, definitely a "thinker" game. This box comes with 4 sets of 15 lists that have some modern categories like "websites" and "island hot spots", 4 cardboard backs, a letter die, and an hourglass-shaped timer.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Enthoven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game always have always will. I'm still terrible at it. ( I don't work well under pressure) funny game and fun to play with lots of people. Great for work parties or any kind of parties. You could easily add your own drinking game rules if you wanted to make it an adult only version.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: Fun family game. We have had a lot of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game!!! It is always the go to family holiday game. The answers our family tries to get away with is hilarious. It makes for a fun family game night or anything to pass the time away and lighten up the mood if needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Good family fun!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I like to play board games - me, my husband, and our 11-year-old daughter. I remember playing this with my family when I was younger, and so I decided to buy it for our daughter last Chrismtas. This is the first game my daughter picks on game nights. We have so much fun, and I love her clever answers!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie BianchettaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... for a while now and it is a very fun game to
customer_reviews.text: got this for my granddaughter she really likes it and I have had the game for a while now and it is a very fun game to play
customer_reviews.author: luvmy7

product_meta.title: Scattergories Game
product_meta.description: Size:standartThink fast! Team up in this fun, fast-paced game and rack your brain for items that fit the category. Can you think of articles of clothing, things you fold, or things at the beach that start with S? You score points when you come up with things that no one else does. But you've only got seconds to come up with them! The more creative your answers, the more points you score! Scattergories and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Scattergories game challenges you to come up with items fast
You score points when you come up with items that nobody else does
Play in teams for tons of fun
Includes timer, die, Scattergories cards, score sheets and instructions. Ages 13 and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,406 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
